00042 #ifndef _orxANDROID_H_
00043 #define _orxANDROID_H_
00044 
00045 #if defined(__orxANDROID__)
00046 
00047 #include <jni.h>
00048 
00049 extern orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION  pfnRun;
00050 
00051 void MainLoop();
00052 
00053 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00054 {
00055   /* Inits the Debug System */
00056   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00057 
00058   /* Checks */
00059 //  orxASSERT(_u32NbParams > 0);
00060 //  orxASSERT(_azParams != orxNULL);
00061   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00062 
00063   /* register run function */
00064   pfnRun = _pfnRun;
00065 
00066   /* Registers main module */
00067   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00068 
00069   /* Registers all other modules */
00070   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00071 
00072   /* Calls all modules setup */
00073   orxModule_SetupAll();
00074 
00075   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00076   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00077   {
00078     MainLoop();
00079   }
00080 
00081   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00082 
00083   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00084 }

00086 #elif defined (__orxANDROID_NATIVE__)
00087 
00088   #include <android/log.h>
00089   #include <nv_native_app_glue.h>
00090   #include <android/sensor.h>
00091 
00092 #define  LOG_TAG    "orxAndroid.h"
00093 #define  LOGI(...)  __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO,LOG_TAG,__VA_ARGS__)
00094 #define  LOGE(...)  __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_ERROR,LOG_TAG,__VA_ARGS__)
00095 
00096 /* Defined in orxAndroidNativeSupport.c */
00097 extern struct android_app *pstApp;
00098 extern orxS32                     u32NbParams;
00099 extern orxSTRING                 *azParams;
00100 extern const ASensor             *poAccelerometerSensor;
00101 extern ASensorEventQueue         *poSensorEventQueue;
00102 
00103 static orxINLINE void orx_Execute(orxU32 _u32NbParams, orxSTRING _azParams[], const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00104 {
00105   /* Inits the Debug System */
00106   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00107 
00108   /* Checks */
00109   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00110 
00111   /* Registers main module */
00112   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00113 
00114   /* Registers all other modules */
00115   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00116 
00117   /* Calls all modules setup */
00118   orxModule_SetupAll();
00119 
00120   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00121   if(orxParam_SetArgs(_u32NbParams, _azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00122   {
00123     /* Inits the engine */
00124     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00125     {
00126       /* Registers default event handler */
00127       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00128 
00129       /* Displays help */
00130       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00131       {
00132         orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00133         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00134         orxBOOL   bStop;
00135 
00136         /* Clears payload */
00137         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00138 
00139         /* Main loop */
00140         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00141             bStop == orxFALSE;
00142             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00143         {
00144           /* Reads all pending events */
00145           orxS32 s32Ident, s32Events;
00146           struct android_poll_source *pstSource;
00147 
00148           /* For all system events */
00149           while((s32Ident = ALooper_pollAll((nv_app_status_interactable(pstApp) || sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) ? 0 : -1, NULL, (int *)&s32Events, (void **)&pstSource)) >= 0)
00150           {
00151              /* Valid source? */
00152              if(pstSource != NULL)
00153              {
00154                /* Process its event */
00155                pstSource->process(pstApp, pstSource);
00156              }
00157 
00158             /* If a sensor has data, process it now */
00159             if(s32Ident == LOOPER_ID_USER)
00160             {
00161               /* Has accelerometer? */
00162               if(poAccelerometerSensor != NULL)
00163               {
00164                 orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stAccelPayload;
00165                 ASensorEvent            oEvent;
00166 
00167                 /* Inits event's payload */
00168                 orxMemory_Zero(&stAccelPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00169 
00170                 /* For all accelerometer events */
00171                 while(ASensorEventQueue_getEvents(poSensorEventQueue, &oEvent, 1) > 0)
00172                 {
00173                   /* Inits event */
00174                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fX = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.x;
00175                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fY = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.y;
00176                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.vAcceleration.fZ = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.z;
00177 
00178                   /* Sends event */
00179                   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stAccelPayload);
00180                 }
00181               }
00182             }
00183           }
00184           /* Should update? */
00185           if(nv_app_status_interactable(pstApp))
00186           {
00187             /* Sends frame start event */
00188             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00189 
00190             /* Runs the engine */
00191             eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00192 
00193             /* Updates clock system */
00194             eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00195 
00196             /* Sends frame stop event */
00197             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00198 
00199             /* Updates frame counter */
00200             stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00201           }
00202         }
00203       }
00204       /* Removes event handler */
00205       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00206 
00207       /* Exits from engine */
00208       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00209     }
00210 
00211     /* Exits from all modules */
00212     orxModule_ExitAll();
00213   }
00214   
00215   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00216   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00217 }
